SnapshotOraclev11g.name: mvc_marksheet
SnapshotOraclev11g.subquery: SELECT "SCHOOL_CODE", "BATCH_NO", "CLASS_CODE", "SECTION_CODE", "TERM_CODE", "STUDENT_ID", "PART_NAME", "RANKING_TYPE", "ACADEMIC_CODE", "CATEGORY_CODE", "DOMAIN_CODE", "SUPER_CODE", "SUBJECT_CODE", "DOMAIN", "SUBJECT", "MAIN_MAX_MARK", "INTER_MAX_MARK", "TOTAL_MAX_MARK", "MAIN_PASS_MARK", "INTER_PASS_MARK", "TOTAL_PASS_MARK", "MAIN_MARK_OBTAINED", "INTER_MARK_OBTAINED", "TOTAL_MARK_OBTAINED", "STATUS", "PERCENTAGE" FROM ( SELECT "SCHOOL_CODE", "BATCH_NO", "CLASS_CODE", "SECTION_CODE", "TERM_CODE", "STUDENT_ID", "PART_NAME", "RANKING_TYPE", "ACADEMIC_CODE", "CATEGORY_CODE", "DOMAIN_CODE", "SUPER_CODE", "SUBJECT_CODE", "DOMAIN", "SUBJECT", to_char(main_max_mark) AS "MAIN_MAX_MARK", to_char(inter_max_mark) AS "INTER_MAX_MARK", to_char(total_max_mark) AS "TOTAL_MAX_MARK", to_char(main_pass_mark) AS "MAIN_PASS_MARK", to_char(inter_pass_mark) AS "INTER_PASS_MARK", to_char(total_pass_mark) AS "TOTAL_PASS_MARK", to_char(main_mark_obtained) AS "MAIN_MARK_OBTAINED", to_char(inter_mark_obtained) AS "INTER_MARK_OBTAINED", to_char(total_mark_obtained) AS "TOTAL_MARK_OBTAINED", "STATUS", to_char(percentage) AS "PERCENTAGE" FROM ( SELECT * FROM mvc_marksheet_nur UNION SELECT * FROM mvc_marksheet_kg4 UNION SELECT * FROM mvc_marksheet_kg5 UNION SELECT * FROM mvc_marksheet_cl1 UNION SELECT * FROM mvc_marksheet_cl2 UNION SELECT * FROM mvc_marksheet_cl3 UNION SELECT * FROM mvc_marksheet_cl4 UNION SELECT * FROM mvc_marksheet_cl5 UNION SELECT * FROM mvc_marksheet_cl6 UNION SELECT * FROM mvc_marksheet_cl7 UNION SELECT * FROM mvc_marksheet_cl8 UNION SELECT * FROM mvc_marksheet_cl9 UNION SELECT * FROM mvc_marksheet_cl10 UNION SELECT * FROM mvc_marksheet_cl11sc UNION SELECT * FROM mvc_marksheet_cl11art UNION SELECT * FROM mvc_marksheet_cl12sc UNION SELECT * FROM mvc_marksheet_cl12art ) UNION ( SELECT "SCHOOL_CODE", "BATCH_NO#", "CLASS_CODE", "SECTION_CODE", "TERM_CODE", "STUDENT_ID", "PART_NAME", "RANKING_TYPE", "ACADEMIC_CODE", "CATEGORY_CODE", "DOMAIN_CODE", "SUPER_CODE", "SUBJECT_CODE", "DOMAIN", "SUBJECT", "MAIN_MAX_MARK", "INTER_MAX_MARK", "TOTAL_MAX_MARK", "MAIN_PASS_MARK", "INTER_PASS_MARK", "TOTAL_PASS_MARK", "MAIN_MARK_OBTAINED", "INTER_MARK_OBTAINED", "TOTAL_MARK_OBTAINED", "STATUS", "PERCENTAGE" FROM arc_std_marksheet ) ) wd ORDER BY school_code, batch_no, class_code, section_code, term_code, student_id, part_name, ranking_type, ( SELECT a.serial_no FROM subject_category a WHERE a.code = wd.category_code ) ASC NULLS LAST, ( SELECT a.serial_no FROM school_domain a WHERE a.school_code = wd.school_code AND a.class_code = wd.class_code AND a.domain_code = wd.domain_code ) ASC NULLS LAST, ( SELECT a.serial_no FROM school_super a WHERE a.school_code = wd.school_code AND a.batch_no# = wd.batch_no AND a.class_code = wd.class_code AND a.super_code = wd.super_code ) ASC NULLS LAST, ( SELECT serial_no FROM school_subject WHERE school_code = wd.school_code AND batch_no# = wd.batch_no AND class_code = wd.class_code AND subject_code = wd.subject_code ) ASC NULLS LAST
